announcements_html:
• ENROLL in the Spring Meal Plan Program today!
  • Check out the House Dining events that are happening in APRIL!
  • Discover MIT's Farmer's Market in the Gates Lobby in Stata - Tuesdays from 10am-4pm.
  • DID YOU KNOW...
  • You can reserve the R&D Pub for your event? Call Ashley at 617-253-2735 for more information!

retail.name: Anna's Taqueria
retail.description_html:
The R&D, like all of Stata Center, is a creative space offering a relaxed atmosphere for the MIT. Located on 4th floor, the Pub offers ample seating for impromptu gatherings with friends and colleagues, including a mezzanine with soft seating. Order everything from crudité and fruit and cheese, to sushi and personal pan pizzas. Beverages include beer and wine, along with soft drinks, tea, and coffee. 21+ only please.

Please contact Ashley Griset, 617-253-2735, if you would like to reserve the R&D Pub for your special event!

retail.menu_html:
Menu options:

Appetizers

  • R& D Nachos- Crisp Nachos smothered with melted cheddar cheese, jalapenos, diced tomatoes, topped off with salsa, sour cream and guzcomole.
  • Chicken Quesadilla – Grilled Tortilla, stuffed with marinated chicken, salsa, cheddar cheese, tomatoes and scallions. Sour cream served on the side.
  • Roasted Potato Wedges – Basket of Roasted Potato Wedges served with zesty Garlic Aioli.
  • Pita chips with dip – Pita triangles seasoned and baked served with garlic hum...
